subject: Re: my guest list log in

full_threads.body:
Hi Michelle, 

I'm so glad!!! 

Ok we have added it across the top of the site on every page, and as a button in the footer of the site. Post Christmas, we can take the top one away or tweak it for the next holiday period, e.g. Mother's day etc.

Let me know what you think?

Heath,we have the link!

Here is the landing page

https://tickets.myguestlist.com.au/v25dd227d2e1b46/gift-vouchers/evs5dd227d2e8b38/ <https://tickets.myguestlist.com.au/v25dd227d2e1b46/gift-vouchers/evs5dd227d2e8b38/>

Is there anything else you need?

M x


On Fri, 15 Nov 2019 at 1:44 pm, Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:
Amazing!! Ok we are on standby.

Thanks,

Heath Maguire
Creative Director - Wolf IQ

P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271
E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>
www.wolfiq.com.au <http://www.wolfiq.com.au/>

> On 15 Nov 2019, at 1:06 pm, Michelle Grand-Milkovic <info@lovefish.com.au <mailto:info@lovefish.com.au>> wrote:
>
> ﻿

> Thank you.
> I have spoken to Courtney.
> Set up is easy - I will send through the link once the landing page is set up.
> They will waive monthly fee of $90 and stripe fees can be passed on to customers. So good result.
>
> M x
>
>
>
> On Fri, 15 Nov 2019 at 12:13 pm, Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:
> Perfect thanks Michelle.
>
> Confirming the pop up and footer newsletter subscribe is also operational and sending the data into My Guest List!
>
> Let me know how you go with MyGuest list regarding the gift cards.
>
> Here’s an example of one we can facilitate through the website that we created: https://www.nicksgroup.com.au/gift-certificates/ <https://www.nicksgroup.com.au/gift-certificates/>
>
> It would require you receiving a notification and then generating and sending the gift cert though.
>
> Thanks and speak soon,
>
> HEATH MAGUIRE
